content: Do we have a tmLanguage grammar for Lean?
The vscode-lean4 extension uses this (cf. these VS Code docs).
Yuri de Wit has marked this topic as resolved.

FWIW, I submitted a PR to shikijs's registry of languages so that lean can be part of list out of the box. It has integrations with markdown-it, Rehype, Monaco Editor, VitePress, Nuxt, Astro, Expressive Code, Common Transformers, etc.

https://github.com/shikijs/textmate-grammars-themes/pull/69
Realized that there is a feature request for PrismJS sitting in a queue.
